channel.title: I am stepping down as GMod, active immediately
channel.description:
Yes, I hereby give up my moderator post.* The reason for this is as follows:
You no life fuck wits respect losers who are outcasted rejects irl but i am not i have a good life irl thats y i pmed al the mods with shit i am getting banned and will never be back i will have a good life while u waste urs here,. and if you dont take this seriously theN ur in denial
I recieved this in PM, after muting "Java Ownz U", from him. I understand what he is saying and realise that he is right, I am clearly a loser for wanting to benefit this community and remove idiots. I will also not be posting here anymore. I NEED TO SORT MY LIFE OUT. *I may be lying.

item.title: I am stepping down as GMod, active immediately
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

oh apparently my sarcasm detector failed me

/beats

Read full topic
